pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, November 15, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Bali, Indonesia

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the official welcome by the President of Indonesia, Joko Widodo.

Note for media:

  • Official media and host broadcaster coverage

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Session I on food and energy security.

Note for media:

  • Official media and host broadcaster coverage

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a G20 Leaders’ luncheon given by the President of Indonesia, Joko Widodo.

Note for media:

  • Official media only

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Session II on health.

Closed to media

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Partnership for Global Infrastructure and Investment event.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of South Africa, Cyril Ramaphosa.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 Leaders’ dinner given by the President of Indonesia, Joko Widodo.

Note for media:

  • Official photographers and host broadcaster coverage of official arrivals
